title: Hanukkah With Chef Einat Admony
desc:
Downstairs With ?.A NEW dining experience by Bar Bolonat and Chef Einat Admony! 
 Experience Bar Bolonat in a way that you have never experienced it before!  Downstairs With  is an intimate monthly dinner series in our stunning event space. ?The series will invite various guest chefs to explore flavors from around the world, all in collaboration with Chef Einat Admony. 
 On  December 13, 2015,  Chef Einat Admony invites you to celebrate  Hanukkah  at Bar Bolonat! 
 This special evening will feature four courses of Chef Einat?s personal favorite Hanukkah dishes, prepared and presented by Chef Einat herself!! ?Guests will enjoy wine pairings for each course . 
 
 2 Seatings Available (limited space): 
 6:00pm OR 8:30pm
